official_title: A bill for the relief of Mr. Conwell F. Robinson and Mr. Gerald R. Robinson.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to grant a life estate special use permit to two named individuals to use described property in Glacier National Park.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of Mr. Conwell F. Robinson and Mr. Gerald R. Robinson.
